ge mtshan ma med pa'i gzhung ni/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gzhung ni/ yang dag pa'i bden pa mi g.yo ba yin no/ /
yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba'i gzhung ni/ chos so cog ldan no/ /pho dge ba/ yang dag pa'i gzhung la 'dug pa ni/ sdug bsngal gsum gyi mtsho las 'das so/ /shA ri'i bus
gsol pa/ chos so cog thams cad ni/ tshig kun dang / yi ge lags so/ /tshig dang yi ge'i gzugs ni/ gzhung ma mchis pa lags so/ /yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung
ni| tshig gis bshad du mi rung na/ yang dag par gshegs par ji ltar chos bshad/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ ngas chos bshad pa ni/ khyed sems can gyi rnams bshad
pa'i khar lus pas na/ bshad du mi rung ba bshad do/ /de lta bas na/ bshad ces bya'o/ /ngas bshad do cog ni/ gzhung gi tshig ste/ yi ge med do/ /sems can gyis bshad
pa ni| yi ge'i tshig ste/ gzhung med do/ /gzhung med pa'i tshig ni/ kun stong pa'o/ /med pa'i stong pa'i chos ni/ gzhung med pa'i tshig go /gzhung bzhin gyi tshig ni/ bden
pa'i stong pa ste/ mi stong pa'o/ /stong pa dang bden pa yang dag par med de/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral la/ bar ma dang / bar ma med pa'ang med de/ bar ma med pa'i chos
ni| mtshan ma gsum dang bral te gnas kyang mi mthong ngo / /yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad do/ /mi g.yo ba la yod med kyang med do/ /med pa'ang med do/ /mi g.yo ba la
yod med med do/ /yod med dang / yod pa dang / med pa gnas med do/ /gnas med pa bshad pas na/ mi g.yo ba la gnas so/ /mi g.yo ba la'ang mi g.yo ba med na/ mi g.yo
ba med par ma bshad do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ sems can thams cad dang / log sred kyi gral gang la sogs par gnang na/ yang dag par gshegs pa dang / yang
dag par gshegs pa'i bden pa'i mtshan ma phyin pa thob/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ log sred kyi sems nas yang dag par gshegs pa dang / yang dag par gshegs
pa'i bden pa'i mtshan mar phyi na pa ni/ gral rnam pa lnga la gnas te/ gcig ni/ yid ches pa'i gral yin te/ lus 'di'i nang gi yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba'i sa bon mi
bden par bsgribs par yid ches te/ mi bden pa'i sems btang bral na/ dang ba'i sems dkar gtsang ste/ khams kyi rnams yid dang tshig gis bye brag phyed par rig go /
gnyis ni/ bsam pa'i gral te/ bsam pa ni/ gral rnams las brtags na yid dang tshig 'ba' zhig ste/ yid dang tshig gis bye brag phyed nas yid bzhin mngon par snang na
khams mthong ngo cog kun bdag gi phyi mo'i shes pa ma yin no/ /phyi mo'i shes pa 'di la ni/ chos kyang med/ gzhung yang med/ blang ngo cog blang nus pa
med par rig go /gsum ni/ spyod pa'i gral te/ rtag par g.yo nus pa g.yos na/ g.yo ba mthun pa'i tshe sngar shes rabs kyis drangs te bsgribs pa dang bgegs kyi
rnams bsal nas bkab pa dang / dkris pa las byung bral lo/ /bzhi ni/ spyad pa'i gral te/ spyad pa'i sa rnams dang bral la/ sems la blang ba dang btang ba med de shin
tu dag pa las rtsa ba rnos te sems mi g.yo bas na/ yang dag par mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa'i dbyings mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa chen po 'ba' zhig
go /lnga ni/ btang snyoms kyi grol te/ btang snyoms ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa'i drang po'i shes rab la'ang mi gnas te/ snying rje chen po la 'bab cing 'khor kyang mtshan ma mi
g.yo'o| |mtshan ma ni/ mi g.yo ba la'ang ma chags te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi stong pa'i sems kyang thob pa med/ sems la mu med mtha' med de/ gnas
kyang mi mthong ba de ni/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i phyin pa'o/ /pho dge ba/ gral lnga ni/ tshor ba gcig phyi mo bsod pa nas zhugs te/ sems can bstan pa ni/ phyi
mo'i gnas nas so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ ji ltar na phyi mo'i gnas zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ phyi mo nas phyi mo'i gnas med na gnas med pa'i phyi mo'i mu nas bde
bar zhugs te byang chub spyod na/ 'phrul gyi lam gang zhig grub bo/ /ji lta zhes byas na/ pho dge ba/ lag pas stong pa la bzung ba dang mtshungs pas mtho ba ste/ ma khyab pa'ang me
do| |shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ btsun pas bshad pa bzhin te/ don gyi sngon logs su phyi mo'i bzod pa spyad de/ blang ba/ stong pa/ zhi ba/ bsam pa yin no/ /stong pa zhi ba ni/ mi
g.yo ba yin te/ legs so cog gi mdo bsdus shing bzung bas na/ chos so cog kun 'dus pas rdzogs chub ste/ gnyis su med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /shes par byos shi
chos de ni/ shes rab chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /lha chen po'i sngags yin no/ /snang ba chen po'i sngags yin no/ /bla na med pa'i sngags yin no/ /bsgrub tu med pa'i
sngags yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de yin no/ /yang dag par mi g.yo ba'i stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i shes rab kyi mes mdud pa rnams bsregs te med nas
mnyam snyoms so/ /mnyam snyoms pa'i snyoms pa tshor ba gsum dang / dam pa'i tshor ba'i lus gsum gyis dgu shes pa'i nang sangs der snang zhing gtsang zhing gtsang dag la grib
ma rnams med do/ /pho dge ba/ de chos de ni/ rgyu yang med rkyen yang med de/ shes rab rang spyod pa'o/ /g.yo ba'ang med mi g.yo ba'ang med de/ spyod pa'i ngo
bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /gzhung la yod med do/ /stong pa'i mtshan ma'ang stong pa'o/ /pho dge ba ni/ sems can de dag gzhung de la rtogs par chud par gyis shig /gzhung de
chud na| yang dag par gshegs pa mthong ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i gzhung brtag pa ni/ 'bab pa rnams la chags te/ bsam gtan
bzhi dang bral nas spyi yod las 'das so/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de yin no/ /ji lta zhe na/ chos so cog gi ming gi rnam grangs te/ bsam gtan bzhi de'ang de dang
mtshungs so/ /yang dag par gshegs pa mthong na/ yang dag par gshegs pa'i sems rang dbang pas rtag par med pa zhi bar gnas so/ /'byung yang mi 'byung / 'jug kyang
mi 'jug ste/ phyi nang mnyam snyoms so/ /pho dge ba/ de bsam gtan de rnams kyis brtags na/ 'du shes kun thob ste/ mi g.yo ba med pas phan tshun med do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /mi g.yo ba spyad de mi g.yo ba'i yang dag pa la brtags na/ mi g.yo ba'i mtshan ma la rtogs pa mi mthong bas mtshan ma rnams stong zhing
zhi'o| |stong zhing zhin/ mi g.yo ba'i gzhung yin no/ /de lta bu'i 'du shes bsam gtan thub pa yin te/ bsam gtan nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid
g.yo ba'i rnam grangs dang bral te/ gos pa'ang med/ bsgo ba'ang med/ chos kyang med/ 'grib pa'ang med de/ rnam par rtog pa'i rnam grangs dang bral bas phyi mo'i gzhung gis gzhung
bzhin no/ /pho dge ba/ de lta bur rtogs te thub na/ gzod ming bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /yang dag par gshegs pas rtag par
mi g.yo pa'i yang dag pa spyod de/ sems can bstan pa de lta bu'i yang dag pa'i gzhung la yi ge'i 'bru mang la gzhung gi rgya che ste/ rtsa ba rno ba'i sems can gyis gdod spyad nus kyi/
rtsa ba rtul ba'i sems can gyis yid gzhag dka'o/ /ji lta bu'i thabs kyis rtsa ba rtul ba de bden pa chud par bgyir rung / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ rtsa ba rtul ba de'i tshig bzhi
le'u gcig ma nos te gzungs su 'dzin tu bcug na/ yang dag pa'i bden par chud de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos so cog ni/ le'u gcig gi nang du 'dus so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol
pa| ji lta bur na tshig bzhi le'u gcig ces bgyi ba bshad par smon to/ /de nas btsun pas le'u bshad de gsungs pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa'i gzhung / /gzhung de yod med
skye ba med/ /skye dang shi rnams gzhung med na/ /gzhung de skye de shi ba med/ /de nas phal mang pos le'u bshad pa thos nas thams cad kun shin tu dga'
ste| kun skye shi med par byas pa thos nas shes rab kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa'i ye shes kyi chos skyes so/ /rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge'i le'u bdun te yang dag par
gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi le'u'o// //de'i ya rabs tshangs par spyod pa sngon gyi gnas nas langs te sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ skye ba'i gzhung ni/
ma bkag /shi ba'i gzhung ni/ mi skye/ de lta bu mi g.yo ba'i gzhung ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lags so/ /byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis/ rnam par
rtog pa'i shes rab ma mchis so/ /rnam par rtog pa'i grangs ma mchis pa'i mtshan ma ni/ rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig gis bkab bo/ /de lta bu'i gzhung gi mtshan ma ni/
bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nang na rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ btsun pa/ chos so cog grangs ni/ dpag tu ma mchis/ mu ma mchis pa'i chos
kyi mtshan ma ni/ yang dag pa gcig gi gzhung gi ngo bo nyid de/ ngo bo nyid gcig 'ba' zhig la gnas pa de'i don ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ ya rabs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa ni/ ngas chos rnams la bshad pa la bslad pa rnams kyi phyir thabs kyi lam spyod do/ /chos so cog gi mtshan ma ni/ yang dag pa gcig gi gzhung gi shes rab bo/ /
ji lta zhe na/ dper tshong dus gcig la sgo chen po bzhi phye ba dang mtshungs te/ sgo chen po bzhi kun ni/ tshong dus gcig la 'dus te/ phal mang po de rnams yid bzhin du 'jug go /
chos rnams kyi ro bro ba'ang de dang mtshungs so/ /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol pa/ chos de lta bu lags na/ bdag gis chos gcig ro bro ba la gnas na/ chos so 'tshal
gyi ro bro ba 'dus pa'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de yin no/ /ji lta zhe na/ gcig gi yang dag pa'i gzhung gi ro ni/ mtsho chen po gcig dang mtshungs te/ thams cad
mang po 'bab pa der mi 'jug pa med do/ /ya rabs chos so cog gi ro bro ba'ang mang po 'bab pa de dang mtshungs so/ /ming grangs tha dad mod kyi/ chur mi tshugs pa med do/ /mtsho
chen po la gnas na mang po 'bab pa 'dus te/ ro bro ba gcig la gnas pas ni/ ro bro ba kun 'dus so/ /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol pa/ chos la ro gcig pu ni/ ji
lta bur theg pa gsum gyi lam ste/ de'i shes rab mtshungs zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ ya rabs/ dper na/ chu bo gang+gA dang / ha dang / ho he dang / mtsho dang mtshungs te/
che chung tha dad do/ /ming mkhan tha dad do/ /chu de gong gi nang na 'dug pa na/ ming gong gi chu zhes bya'o/ /'o yi nang na 'dug na/ 'o yi chu zhes bya'o/ /ha'i nang na
'dug na/ ha'i chu zhes bya'o/ /kun lhan cig mtsho'i nang na 'dug na/ ming mtsho chu zhes bya'o/ /chos kyang de dang mtshungs/ de kun yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba la 'dug ste/ ming
sangs rgyas kyi lam 'ba' zhig go /yang ya rabs/ sangs rgyas kyi lam gcig pu la gnas na/ spyad pa gsum spyad pa ma yin no/ /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol
pa| ji lta bur na spyad pa gsum zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ gcig ni/ don bzhin du spyod pa blangs pa'o/ /gsum ni/ mi g.yo ba bzhin du blangs te spyod pa'o/ /
ya rabs/ de lta bu spyod pa gsum gyis sgo mang po'i mdo bsdus te/ chos thams cad kyi sgo mo 'dir mi 'jug pa med do/ /spyod pa 'dir zhugs pa ni/ stong pa'i mtshan ma
mi skye'o| |de ltar zhugs pa ni/ yang dag par gshegs par zhugs zhes byar rung ngo / /yang dag par gshegs par zhugs pa ni/ zhugs zhugs na ma zhugs so/ /ya
rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par gshegs pa'i mdzod du 'jug pa ljang bu las 'bur rnyed pa dang mtshungs te/ 'jug pa'i
gnas med do/ /phyi mo rtsa ba rno ba'i grub ste phyi mo thob na/ phyi mo bden pa'i mu thob pa de'i shes rab du mchis/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ shes rab de la grangs med de/ mdo tsam
zhig bshad na shes rab de la bzhi yod do/ /bzhi gang zhes byas na/ gcig ni/ thub pa'i shes rab ste/ 'di ni/ mi g.yo ba bzhin no/ /gnyis ni/ 'gyur ba'i shes rab ste/ de ni/
thabs kyis ni/ bshig pa'o/ /gsum ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab ste/ de ni/ glog gi tshor ba bsal ba'o/ /bzhi ni/ mtha' yun gyi shes rab ste/ yang dag pa'i cho ga tshang
ba'i lam du 'jug pa'o/ /ya rabs/ de lta bu'i don chen po bzhi ni/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa ste/ zab mo chen po yin no/ /sems can bstan na/ shes
rab 'di spyad pa'i rigs ya rabs tshangs par spyod pa chen po yin no/ /yang don chen po rnam gsum yod de/ ting nge 'dzin gsum phyi nang du gcig la gcig mi gnod do/ /gnyis
ni| gzhung chen po 'khor la lam bzhin du brdabs te bsal ba'o/ /gsum ni/ mi g.yo ba'i shes rab thub pas snying rje dang gnyis ka rno ba'o/ /de lta bu'i don gsum gyi byang chub
'byor 'grub bo/ /de lta bu'i don ma spyad na shes rab de bzhin du 'bab mi nus te/ bdud chen po rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'ong ngo / /ya rabs/ khyod la sogs pa mang pos sangs
rgyas grub kyi bar du rtag par spyod pa sbyangs te skad cig kyang stong pa ma byed cig /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol pa/ ji lta bur na ting nge 'dzin gsum
zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gsum zhes bya ba de ni/ stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba med pa'i ting nge
'dzin dang / de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas gsol pa/ ji lta bur na 'khor gzhung chen po 'khor zhes bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ chen po
bzhi'i gzhung ste/ phung po dang / khams dang / zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor to/ /phyi mo'i rnam par shes pas gzhung chen po'i 'khor yin no/ /ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas
gsol pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu'i shes rab kyi don ni/ bdag la'ang lan/ gzhan la'ang phan te/ khams kyi sa las 'das nas mya ngan 'das pa la'ang mi chags
te| byang chub kyi lam du chud do/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi mtshan ma ni/ skye shi'i chos yin te/ rnam par rtog pa dang bral na chos ni/ ma zhi ba'o/ /de nas yang dag par gshegs
pas gzhung 'di bslab pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa/ chos ni rnam par rtog las skyes/ /slar yang rnam par rtog la bkag /rnam par rtog pa'i chos bkag na/ /chos de
skye shi zhi ba med/ /de nas ya rabs tshangs par spyod pas le'u bshad pa thos nas yid shin tu dga' ste gzhung 'di bslab par tshigs su bcad pa bshad do/ /chos rnams stong pa
phyi mo zhi| |stong pa zhi ba skye ba med/ /chos gzhan skyes shing shi ba yin/ /chos 'di skye ba med pa med/ /de dang 'di ni mi mthun te/ /chad dang rtag dang yod phyir ro/ /'di ni gnyis
dang bral ba ste/ /tshig gcig la yang mi 'jug go /chos gcig yod ces bshad pa ni/ /de'i gzugs spu yi 'khor lo bzhin/ /smig rgyus chu ru bslad dang mtshungs/ /sgyu ma mi bden
rnam phyir ro/ /chos la med par mthong ba ni/ /chos stong par ni mthun pa yin/ /dmus long gnyid med long ba bzhin/ /chos rnams rus sbal spu dang mtshungs/ /bdag nga sangs rgyas
bshad pa thos/ /chos la gnyis mthong med par rig /dbu ma la yang mi chags so/ /de lta bas na chags blangs te/ /yang dag gshegs pas chos bshad pa/ /kun kyang ma chags
med las byung / /bdag ni chags pa med gnas nas/ /yang dag gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag gshegs la gus phyag 'tshal/ /ye shes mi g.yo stong pa bzhin/ /chags
med pa la'ang mi chags te/ /chags med lus la gus phyag 'tshal/ /bdag ni gnas kun thams cad na/ /rtag par yang dag gshegs rnams mthong / /yang dag gshegs pa rnams
mthong gi/ bdag la rtag chos bshad par smon/ /de nas yang dag par gshegs pas tshig 'di gsungs so/ /pho dge ba rnams/ khyod la sogs pa brtags
par nyon cig /khyed mang po la sogs pa la brtag pa'i chos bshad do/ /pho dge ba/ brtag pa'i chos dang / brtag pa med pa'i chos la bshad pa'ang med/ yi ge 'bru'ang med/
bden pa'ang med/ grol thar yang med/ med pa'ang med/ khams kyang med/ mi bden pa'i chad pa'i mu rnams dang bral te/ chos 'di rtag pa med pa med de/ rtag pa dang / chad pa mtho
ba rnams dang bral bas shes pa rtag pa yin par mngon par mthong ngo / /shes pa ni/ rtag par stong zhi ste/ stong zhi ba'ang stong zhi'o/ /pho dge ba/ stong zhi bar rig na mi stong / mi zhing
sems rtag par stong zhi'o/ /stong zhi ba thob na sems rtag par yang dag par zhugs te ming dang kha dog gi rnams rig na/ gti mug gi sems 'ba' zhig yin no/ /gti mug gi
sems kyis rnam par brtags te chos rnams bye brag phye na/ tha dad pa gzhan med kyi/ ming dang kha dog las byung ngo / /chos de lta bu yin par rig na/ yi ge'i 'bru dang / tshig las
mi 'brangs te/ sems dang sems kyi gzhung gis nga la rnam par mi rtog go /nga sgyu ma'i mi yin par rig na/ gdod stong pa zhi ba thob bo/ /stong pa zhi ba thob na/ gdod bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /de nas tshangs pa ya rabs spyod kyis tshig de skad bshad pa thos nas tshigs su bcad pa bshad do/ /ming dang gzugs las rnam par
brtags/ /chos kyi ming dang gsum zhes bya/ /yang dag mi g.yo drang shes rab/ /de dang bsdoms na lngar 'gyur ro/ /bdag de chos de bshad pas su/ /chad dang rtag pa bcings
brtags te/ /skye dang shi ba'i lam du zhugs/ /chad pa de ni rtag ma yin/ /yang dag gshegs pas stong chos spyad/ /chad dang rtag pas yong bral lo/ /rgyu rkyen med pa mi skye ste/ /
mi skye bas ni mi shi 'o/ /rgyu rkyen yod par 'dzin pa ni/ /stong pa'i me tog 'thu ba bzhin/ /dpe ru me tog 'thu ba bzhin/ /mtha' ru thob par yong mi 'gyur/ /rgyu rkyen blangs pa rnams dang
bral| |gzhan las zhi ba'ang ma yin te/ /bdag gi gzhung yang ma yin no/ /mi g.yo rten pas bde ba thob/ /de ni yang dag bden pa'i chos/ /rtag par rang dbang mi g.yo bzhin/ /chos
rnams zad par kun shes pa/ /las su 'phrul bas sprul pa yin/ /shes rab bral na chos nyid stong / /de bas stong pa'i gnas las bshad/ /skye dang shi ba'i chos bkab ste/ /mya ngan
las su 'das par gnas/ /thugs rje chen pos bsdus pas su/ /mya ngan 'das la mi chags so/ /bsgyur bas blang bar nus pa ste/ /yang dag gshegs pa'i mdzod du tshud/ /de
nas phal mang po'i gzhung de skad bshad pa thos nas kun gyis dang po'i srog theb ste yang dag par gshegs par chud de yang dag par gshegs pa'i mdzod
kyis mchi'o/ /rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge le'u brgyad de mdo 'dzin pa'i le'u'o// //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos phal mang po'i nang nas
langs nas sangs rgyas kyi mdun du phyin nas thal mo sbyar ba dang / pus mo btsugs te sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis phal brtags na sems can la dogs pa
mchis te da dung ma thul to/ /yang dag par gshegs pas dogs pa bsal bar bgyid na/ bdag gis phal mang po'i slad du dogs pa bzhin du dri bar 'tshal na/ sangs rgyas
byams pas thugs rjes gzigs te gnang bar smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis de lta bur sems can gyi ra
mda' bya zhing bsgral nus na/ de lta bu'i snying rje chen po ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyod kyis rgya chen po dris shig dang / khyod la dgrol bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ chos so cog thams cad ji ltar na/ rkyen las ma skyes/ de nas yang dag par gshegs pas gzhung 'di bshad par dgongs nas tshigs su bcad pas
bshad do/ /chos rkyen las su skyes na ni/ /chos rkyen bral na chos med dam/ /ji lta bur na chos nyid med/ /rkyen gyis su ni chos skyes sam/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos
gsol pa/ chos la skye ba ma mchis su lags na/ ji lta bur na bshad pa la sems las byung zhes bgyi/ de nas btsun pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs pa/ sems las skyes
pa'i chos kyis ni/ /chos des blang ba blang nus te/ /dpe ru ra ro mig gis su/ /stong pa'i me tog mthong dang mtshungs/ /chos 'di ngo bo nyid bshad pa/ /de dag dang ni mtshungs ma yin/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ chos de lta bu lags su lags na/ chos la sdod pa ma mchis te/ sdod pa ma mchis na/ chos rab grub pa'i rigs so/ /de nas
btsun pas tshigs su bcad pa bshad do/ /chos kyi phyi mo yong ye med/ /bdag dang gzhan yang de bzhin no/ /thog ma med cing tha ma'ang med/ /grub dang gzhi la'ang mi chags so/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ chos so cog gi mtshan ma ni/ phyi mo nas mya ngan las 'das te/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan ma'ang de bzhin
no| |de lta bu la sogs pa'i chos med pa ni/ chos mi g.yo ba dang mthun no/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de lta bu'i chos med pa chos de ni/ mi g.yo ba yin no/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de lta bu'i mi g.yo ba'i mtshan ma ni/ mthun pa'ang ma mchis/ mi mthun pa'ang ma mchis te/ yid
kyis blangs pa dang / g.yo ba yin te/ yid kyis blangs pa dang / las kyis blangs pa kun stong pa mi g.yo ba'o/ /stong pa mi g.yo ba'i sems kyis chos dang lhan cig pa dang / mi
gcig pa blang du rung ba dang / stong pa zhi ba'i rigs so/ /de nas btsun pas tshigs su bcad pas bshad do/ /stong pa mi g.yo chos rnams ni/ /chos dang mi g.yo mi stong ngo / /
sems de mi g.yo ba yi tshe/ /des su sems ni thob pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ chos de la bden pa ma mchis pas kha dog stong pa'i sems kyang zhi'o/
chos de phyi mo nas zhi bas chos de zhi ba lags pa'i rigs so/ /de nas zhi ba'ang ma mchis na/ ji lta bur gcig ces bgyi/ de nas btsun pas tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa/
chos ni gnas mal med la 'jug /gzugs dang grangs ni stong zhing med/ /ming dang bshad pa chos rnam gnyis/ /de ni blang ba nus ma yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
snying pos gsol pa/ chos so cog gi mtshan ma ni/ 'gram gnyis la mi chags te/ dbus ma'i 'bab pa la'ang mi chags so/ /sems kyi rnam par shes pa'ang de dang mtshungs
na| ji lta bur khams kyi rnams rnam par shes pa las skyes zhes bgyi/ rnam par shes pa skye ba yod du lags na/ rnam par shes pa de'ang skye ba las byung ba ji lta bur rnam par shes pa
skye ba med la/ skye ba yod pa kun skye bar nus zhes bgyi/ de nas btsun pas tshigs su bcad pas bshad do/ /skye ba dang ni skye nus gnyis/ /de gnyis kyis su rkyen bya nus/ /phyi mo
nas su gnyis ka med/ /stong rgyu me tog len dang mtshungs/ /rnam par shes pa ma skyes te/ /khams kyang de tshe skyes ma yin/ /khams rnams ma skyes pa yi tshe/ /de tshe rnam par shes pa zhi'o/ /
de nas phyi mo nas mu med/ /yod dang med dang gnyis ka'ang med/ /skye ba med pa'i shes pa'ang med/ /ji ltar de las khams yod rung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos
gsol pa/ chos kyi mtshan ma de lta lags te phyi nang gnyis ka stong na/ khams dang shes rab gnyis kyang phyi mo nas stong pa zhi ba ste/ yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pa la
bden pa'i mtshan ma ni/ yang dag par stong pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos ni/ 'dus pa ma lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de lta bu'i mi g.yo ba yang dag pa'i chos ni/ gzugs
kyang med/ chags pa'ang med de/ ci yang 'du ba med/ 'dus nus pa'ang med/ gzhung yang med/ chen po'ang med/ phyi mo gcig gi 'khor gyi chos te/ legs pa'i don zab
mo'i phung po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phung po la bdun dang lnga ni/ mi skye/ brgyad dang drug gi stong par zhi
ste| dgu ni/ mtshan ma'ang stong pa med do/ /med pa'i stong pa'ang med do/ /btsun pas bshad pa bzhin te/ chos kyi gzhung kun stong pa'o/ /stong par zhugs na spyad pa med de/
las kyi rnams ma stor bas nga dang nga'i gnas dang / nus pa'i gnas dang / lus kyi mthong ba dang / phyi nang 'dud pas mngags te brtsad par kun stong zhing mi g.yo ba de lta
bu'i gzhung dag pa dang / shes rab dang yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba bstan par smon to/ /btsun pas rtag tu de lta bu bden pa mi g.yo ba'i stong pa'i chos bstan pa sman bzang po
lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stong pa'i ngo bo nyid la skye ba med do/ /sems la rtag par skye ba med do/ /stong
pa'i ngo bo nyid la zhi ba med de/ sems la'ang bya ba'ang med do/ /stong pa'i las 'byung 'jug med de/ thob pa dang stong pa'i rnams dang bral bas phung po dang / khams dang /
zhugs pa la sogs pa kun kyang med do/ /sems mi g.yo mi chags pa de dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa'i rnams bshad pa ni/ yod pa'i bshig pa'i
phyir ro| /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ yod pa btsal na bden pa ma mchis te/ smig rgyu dang / chu dang mtshungs bden par rig ste/ med pa ma lags
na| me'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs so/ /de lta bur rtog pa ni/ mi mdzangs pa lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ de yin no/ /ji ltar mi des yang dag pa la brtags te stong pa
zhi ba gcig pu'i mtshan ma brtags na/ mtshan ma med pa dang mtshungs so/ /stong pa spyad de blangs nas stong pa spyad pas na/ sangs rgyas mthong ba ma stor to/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba
spyad pa na 'bab pa gsum dang bral te/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi nang na grol thar gsum gyi lam mdo gcig ste/ ngo bo nyid med do/ /de'i ngo bo nyid med pas na/ stong ngo / /stong pas
na| mtshan ma med do/ /mtshan ma med pas na/ bya ba med do/ /bya ba med pas na/ btsal ba med do/ /btsal ba med pas na/ smon lam med do/ /de lta bu'i las spyad pas na/
sems gtsang ngo / /sems gtsang bas na/ sangs rgyas mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas mthong bas na/ yul gcang mar skye'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i zab mo'i chos bstan
bas gsum 'grub par spyad de shes rab dang thub pa grub na/ gdod khams gsum las 'das so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ yang dag par gshegs
pas bshad pa la skye ba'ang med/ zhi ba'ang med na/ rtag par med pa yin te/ skye shi bkag na stong zhi ba bkag pa lags so/ /rtag pas ni/ mi chad de/ mi chad
pa'i chos de khams gsum mi g.yo ba'i chos rnams dang bral te/ bya ba yod pa'i chos la ni/ me'i ngo las yol ba dang mtshungs so/ /gang la sogs pa'i chos la brten te bdag
gis bdag spyod pa la sgo mo de gcig pur 'jug /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpas don chen po gsum la rang gi sems spyod de/ bden pa chen po
gsum gyi spyod pa der 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ ji lta bur don gsum la bdag gi sems spyod/ ji lta bur na bden pa gsum gyi spyod pa
gcig tu 'jug /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ don chen po gsum zhes bgyi ba ni/ gcig ni/ rgyu'o/ /gnyis ni/ 'bras bu'o/ /gsum ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /de lta
bu'i don gsum phyi mo nas stong pa med pa ste/ nga dang yang dag pa'i nga med na ji lta bur de la sred cing chags pa skye/ don gsum la brtags na bcings pa khyer te/ khyer bas
sdug bsngal gyi ma tshor 'bab bo/ /de bas na rtag par bdag spyod/ bden pa gsum zhes bya ba ni/ gcig byang chub kyi lam ste/ mnyam snyoms pa'i bden pa yin gyi/ mi
snyoms pa'i bden pa ma yin no/ /gnyis ni/ tshor ba chen po'i drang po'i ye shes thob pa'i bden pa yin no/ /gsum ni/ shes rab dang mthun pa dang / tha dad pa spyad pa med pa'i zhugs
pa'i bden pa ste/ go bdun spyang bas zhugs pas bden pas ma yin no/ /bden pa 'di gsum spyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi lam spyad na/ de lta bu'i chos su chud de drang po'i tshor ba mi
thob pa med do/ /drang po'i tshor ba'i ye shes thob na/ shin tu byams pa chen por 'bab ste/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la phan pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub grub bo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ de lta bu'i chos la rgyu rkyen med do/ /rkyen la rkyen med na/ chos kyi rgyu mi ldang ngo / /ji lta bur mi g.yo ba'i chos kyis yang dag par gshegs
par chud/ de nas yang dag par gshegs pas gzhung 'di dgrol bar dgongs te tshigs su bcad pas bshad do/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan ma ni/ /chos de'i tshe na g.yo ba med//
chos la tha dad dus kyang med/ /de yi tshe na g.yo ba med/ /chos la tha dad dus kyang med/ /tha dad dus las ma langs so/ /chos la g.yo med mi g.yo'o/ /ngo bo stong pa mi g.yo zhing //
ngo bo stong zhing zhi ba'i tshe/ /chos de de yi tshe na byung / /mtshan ma bral bas stong par gnas/ /stong par gnas pas dmigs pa med/ /rkyen las ldang ba'i chos kyi rnams/ /chos de
las ni rkyen mi skye/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang skye ba med/ /skye ba'i stong pa'i ngo bo stong / /rkyen gyi rang bzhin rkyen bya nus/ /rkyen de'i phyi mo rkyen las g.yos/ /chos g.yos/
pas ni rkyen kyang med/ /rkyen med na ni g.yo ba'ang med/ /rgyu rkyen las su skyes pa'i chos/ /chos nyid de ni rgyu rkyen yin/ /rgyu rkyen gyi ni skye shi gzugs/ /de la skye dang shi ba'ang
med| |de ni yang dag bden gzugs bzhin/ /phyi mo nus su 'byung nus med/ /chos rnams de yi tshe na ni/ /'byung zhing nub par rang las skyes/ /shin tu gtsang ma'i phyi mo
nyid| |phyi mo'i rgyu yi stobs ma yin/ /phyin chad de yi gnas thob pa/ /thob pa'i phyi mo'i gtsang ma thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyis bshad do
cog thos nas sems tshim ste/ de'i phal mang po rnams dogs pa med de/ phal mang po rnams shes zin nas tshigs su bcad pa bshad do/ /bdag gis phal gyi sems
dogs rig /da lta bas na brtul bar dris/ /yang dag gshegs pa dge byams che/ /bye brag phye ste lus pa med/ /rnam gnyis kyis ni phal mang po/ /kun gyis gnang zhing mngon
par thob/ /bdag gis da ni zin nas kyis/ /sems can thams cad khyab par bstan/ /yang dag gshegs pas thugs rjes su/ /phyi mo'i smon lam yong ma btab/ /de bas
bu gcig sa gnas su/ /'jig rten mya ngan khams su gnas/ /de nas yang dag par gshegs pas phal mang po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
khor mor byams pa chen po spyad de sems can sdug bsngal las byung ngo / /sems can la la zhig yi ge 'di'i chos gzungs su 'dzin cing byang chub sems dpa' de'i ming dang gzugs
su 'dzin na/ las ngan par mi ltung ste/ sgrib pa'i bgegs thams cad kun bsal te med do/ /sems can la la zhig go bdun gzhan bsam pa med par mi g.yo ba'i 'od byang
chub thob par byas so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas rtag par lus sprul te chos bshad nas mi de'i mgon skyabs byas te mthar skad cig kyang mi gtong zhing mi de la sogs pa
smyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas so/ /khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems can la ston cing slob na/ ji lta bur theg pa chen po
gzhung mi 'gyur ba bye brag phyed pa kun spyod sbyor du chug cig /de nas dga' bos 'dug pa stan las langs te mdun du sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ yang dag par gshegs
pas theg pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dag par mdud pa gcod pa/ skye ba med pa'i tshor ba bsod pa bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu'i chos kyi ming ci zhes
bgyi| chos kyi gzhung de nos te gzungs su bzung na/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob/ sangs rgyas kyi byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la bkrol bshad par
smon to| |sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ pho dge ba/ chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'or bar dgongs pas yang
dag par gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mtshor chud par gsungs so/ /sems can la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa gcig yod na/ chos kyi yi ge thams cad
la ci'ang re zhing btsal ba med/ chos kyi yi ge 'dis ni/ chos kun gyi mdo btus te/ chos so cog gi gces pa bsdus so/ /chos kyi yi ge rnams kyi phyi mo'i bsam pa ste/
chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni/ theg pa chen po bsdus so/ /yang ming rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o/ /yang ming dpag tu med pa'i gzhung gi phyi mo zhes kyang bya ste/ mi la la
zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di nos te gzungs su 'dzin pa zhig yod na/ de brgya stong gis sangs rgyas gzungs su 'dzin pa ste/ de lta bu'i legs pa'i don ni/ dper nam mkha'
dang mtshungs mu mtha' med de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi yi ge 'di gtams bcol to/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i sems spyod pa dang / ji lta bu'i mis chos
kyi yi ge nos shing gzungs su 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ pho dge ba/ chos kyi yi ge 'di nos shing gzungs su 'dzin pa'i mi de ni/ sems thob pa dang / stor ba med la
rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ 'gran tor brjod pa la'ang rtag par mi g.yo ba'i sems la dad de/ grong khyim du zhugs pa'ang sems rtag par thub pa la 'dug go /khyim du 'dug
na'ang yod pa gsum la ma chags pa de lta bu'i da ltar gyi tshe'i dus la dpal yon rnam pa lnga yod de/ gcig ni/ phal gyis btsun zhing gus pa'o/ /gnyis ni/ lus ye 'drog tu mi
'chi ba'o/ /gsum ni/ yon po chad pa yid myur du lan lon pa'o/ /bzhi ni/ sems can bsgral ba la sred pa'o/ /lnga ni/ 'phrul gyi lam du 'jug nus pa ste/ de lta bu'i mis ni/
chos kyi yi ge 'di nos shing gzungs su 'dzin to/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ de lta bu'i mis ni/ sems can rnams bsal la yon blang du rung ngam mi rung / sangs rgyas kyis
gsungs pa/ de lta bu'i mis ni/ sems can rnams kyi phyir dpal zhing chen po byas nas rtag par shes rab chen po spyad de/ dpal gyi rang bzhin bden pa gnyis ka gnas/ dge
'dun gyi gzhi rten pa yin te/ yon rnams la mgo dang / mig dang / rkang pa dang / klad pa de kun kyang blang du rung na/ gos dang kha zas blang du rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ pho dge
ba| de lta bu'i mi ni/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/ khyod kyi zam pa yin na/ mi tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos na yon mi 'bul/ dga' bos gsol pa/
mi de la chos kyi yi ge nos te gzungs su bzung ba yon phul na/ mi des dpal yon ji tsam thob/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ yang mi la la zhig gis mkhar gang ba'i gser
dngul khyer te sbyar bar byas pas mi des chos kyi yi ge bshad zin nas de'i tshe dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phal sde bzhin kun shin tu dga' ste/ sems kyis yang
dag pa'i mir gyur pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te dga' nas gus par spyod do/ /rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa mA d+hi a gra ut+ta ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa/ bam po gcig go /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun sum khri dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po lnga stong tsam dang / lha dang / klu la sogs pa sde brgyad dang /
lha dang / mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi dang / srin po dang / yi dwags la sogs pa sde
bzhi'ang 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas cang ma gsung zhing bzhugs pa las 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du
gyur to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu chos kyi rgyal bu 'dug pa las langs te sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu legs so chos kyi rje/ /ting nge 'dzin la zhi bar bzhugs/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po rnams/ /thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur/ /shin
tu legs so nyi zla'i 'od/ /cang mi gsung bar snang mi mdzad/ /shin tu legs so rin chen gter/ /dbul phongs rnams la sbyin mi mdzad/ /shin tu legs so mi yi rgyal/ /ting
nge 'dzin las bzhengs su gsol/ /shin tu legs so klu yi rgyal/ /bdud rtsi'i char pa dbab tu gsol/ /shin tu legs so lha yi mchog /myur du chos rnams bstan du gsol/ /
shin tu legs so sems can la/ /theg pa gcig don bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /nga la rin po che bla na med pa'i ye shes mang du yod pa khyod la phan pa dang bde bar mdzad cing dbul phongs pa dang bral bar bya ba yod kyi/ the tshom ma byed par ci
dang ci 'dod pa dris shig /de nas dga' bo stan las langs te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ mang du thos pas
bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob snyam na/ mdo sde dag las bshad pa thos pa ltar na mang du thos shing shes rab rno ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub thob pa shin tu
dka' ste/ bgegs brgyad du skye'o/ /zhes 'byung na/ bdag gis ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga'
bo| mang du thos pa la sems rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang / 'khrul pa'i sems so/ /sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni/ mang du thos pas kyang
gnod pa med do/ /sems 'khrul pa la gnas na ni/ mang du thos pas kyang phan pa med de/ gang gis ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang shin tu ldan na/ myur du bla na med
pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mdo kun las ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni/ mchog dam pa'o/ /zhes bstod/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab tu ldan pa ni/ dper na/ ri dwags kyi nang na seng+ge mchog tu gyur pa dang / snang ba
thams cad kyi nang na nyi ma mchog tu gyur pa dang / ri'i nang na ri rab lhun po mchog tu gyur pa lta bu'o/ /de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab tu ldan pa'i shugs ni/
mchog dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ gal te mi zhig gis shing tsan+dan las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas
na| mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ mi de gnyis kyi nang na rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i bsod nams mchog go /sangs rgyas kyis dga'
bo la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang mi zhig gis gser tha mal pa las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis
gser btso ma las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/ de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dga' bos gsol pa/
gser btso ma las byas pa'i bsod nams rab tu che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis shing tsan+dan dang / spos kyi shing gzhan dag las stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma dang /
rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la
khyad par yod dam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / gser btso ma las sku gzugs bgyis pa'i bsod nams che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal
pa| gal te mi zhig gis sbyin pa chen po'i sems bskyed de rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod dang / chung ma dang / bu sbyin pa byin pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis yan lag gi dam
pa mgo dang / mig dang / lus dang / rnyed dka' ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod kyi sbyin pa byin na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par ci yod/ dga' bos gsol
pa| rin po che sna bdun dang / lus dang / chung ma dang / bur bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams che ba lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig
gis mdo sde bcu gnyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams la 'jig rten du spel te klog cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang / de la mi zhig
gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams yi ge bzhin du 'don cing yi ge dang don stong cing khong du chud na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che/
dga' bos gsol pa/ yi ge bzhin du 'don cing khong du chud pa'i bsod nams che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
thogs pa med par kha ton du shes la don zab mo mi shes par mdo sde glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang ba dang / de la mi
zhig mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang byang bar kha ton shes la don zab mo'ang rtogs te/ mdo sde'i glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang
na| mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang mchog tu gyur pa yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ kha ton bgyis la don yang rtogs te/ gzhan la'ang ston cing 'chad pa'i bsod nams
mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis 'grel cing 'chad la/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mi spyod pa dang / gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la/ sbyin pa dang /
tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang rgya cher spyod/ sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang
'dra bar sems snyoms na/ mi de gnyis bsod nams gang che ba yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / tshul khrims
dang / bzod pa spyod cing sems can la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che zhing mang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis
mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga yang byang bar 'chad shes te 'jig rten du spel ba dang / de la mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis
kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la/ bkri ba'i bstan bcos dang / nges pa'i bstan bcos dang / phung po lnga'i bstan bcos dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi
bstan bcos dang / khams bco brgyad kyi bstan bcos dang / stong pa chen po'i bstan bcos dang / nyi zla'i bstan bcos dang / zla ba sbrin gyi bstan bcos dang / mdo sde
rgyan gyi bstan bcos dang / don dam pa nyid kyi bstan bcos dang / rdo rje snying po'i bstan bcos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstan bcos dang / rnam par thar pa'i
sgo gsum gyi bstan bcos la sogs pa bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga'ang shes la/ sbyin ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
snyoms kyang spyod de/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sems gnyis su med cing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi skyon thams cad mi mthong zhing
sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms te dgra sdang ba la'ang nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / de la mi zhig gis phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa
mi 'de bas na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che ba yin/ dga' bos gsol ba/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur ba ma btab na/ mi de'i bsod nams tshad ma
mchis grangs ma mchis te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang mi zhig gi gong du smras pa'i bsod nams thams
cad kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar byed nus la mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga snyed kyang kha ton dang 'grel cing 'chad nus te/
tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa'ang spyod/ sbyin pa'ang byed de/ mang du thos pa'i mchog tu'ang gyur la chos thams cad stong zhing zhi ba'i don yang ston te/ nyan
pa'i mngon bar shes pa lnga thob par byed de/ de ltar phan pa dang de ba'i don byas kyang des ni/ mi zhig nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig ting nge 'dzin du
zhugs pa tsam du mi phod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag ni/ ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal gyi sems che'o/ /de ltar nga rgyal che ba ni/ ngan song du bskal pa
grangs med kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba de las thar na'ang 'dab chags kyi byar skye bar 'gyur na/ mang du thos pa la phan pa ci yod/ gang la bsam
gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yod pa ni/ skye shi 'khor ba'i sdig kha na ma tho ba'i las lci ba byang bar nus so/ /mang du thos pa ni/ rtswa dang 'dra'o/ /ting nge 'dzin ni/ me dang 'dra'o/ /mang
du thos pa ni/ lcags dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ gser dang 'dra'o/ /mang du thos pa ni/ rtsi bdug pa dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ rtsi'i
sdong po dang 'dra'o/ /mang du thos pa ni/ gtsang po dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ ngas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsod nams dang /
yon tan bshad na/ zad pa'i mtha' med de/ bskal par yang mi rdzogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal gangs mngon sum du dran pa sngon 'das
pa'i dus na mang du thos pa'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dang nga gnyis yod med gnyis la rtsod par gyur te/ 'jam dpal ni/ yod ces smra/ ngas ni/ med do/ /zhes smras te/
yod med gnyis kyi bden pa la rtsod par gyur te gcig tu ma chad do/ /tha ma tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skyes par gyur te/ bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du lcags kyi thu lum za
bar gyur to/ /dmyal ba de las thar te sangs rgyas 'od srung dang phrad nas yod pa dang / med pa'i bden pa gnyis 'od srung gis 'di skad du bshad do/ /chos thams cad kyi rang
bzhin ni/ gcig tu nges shing chad pa med de/ khyed yod pa dang / med par smra ba ni/ don de lta bu ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/ bden
pa 'di gnyis ni/ yod pa'ang ma yin la/ med pa'ang ma yin te/ khyed shes pa ni/ yi ge'i don shes par zad kyi/ don zab mo mi shes pas don 'di lta bu ni/ khyed dmus long
dam 'on pa lta bu yin na/ don zab mo 'di lta bu ji ltar shes shing rtogs par gyur ces bshad pa thos nas ri dben par song ste/ bdag nyid yid la byas nas bsam gtan gyi
ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /zhag bdun lon pa dang bsam gtan zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum dang / ye shes rnam gsum dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di dag rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ci'ang med par rtogs
so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na/ bsam gtan sgom pa ni/ mchog dam par rig par bya ste/ gang zhig nyin gcig gam/
mtshan gcig gam/ nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang khad kyis zhi zhing
byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ de'ang gang zhe na/ pha ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug
lag khang bshig pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas khang mes btang ba yin te/ phas pham pa bzhi dang / phas pham pa brgyad dang / lci ba lnga dang / rang bzhin
gyi lci ba drug nyams pa yin/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur pa btab pa yin/ pha rol po'i nyes pa'i skyon smra zhing bkur sti mi byed pa yin/ gang du skyes par nga rgyal
che ba dang / rang bzhin gyis sdig lci ba yang yin te/ de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na rang zhi zhing 'byang bar 'gyur/ de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
mthus 'byang gi /gzhan gyis 'byang ba ma yin no/ /nyin zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan dang / bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob na/ tshe gcig tu dben par ri dang
shing drung du 'dug ste rtog pa bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba yid la byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems ni 'bab chu dang 'dra ste/ skad cig kyang mi
sdod| sems ni/ spre'u dang mtshungs te/ gcig btang yang gcig la 'dzin to/ /mdor na sems ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mi g.yo'o/ /gal te sems g.yo na/ chos thams
cad la 'khrul ba'i 'du shes skye'o/ /gal te ting 'dzin la gnas na ni/ 'jig rten na skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes shing rtogs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
kyis zhi ba/ mi rtag pa/ 'gyur zhing 'pho ba/ stong zhing bdag med pa/ sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa lta bu/ glog dang / rlung dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu/ chu'i dbu ba dang / smig rgyu
dang / brag ca dang / bar snang gi bya'i rjes lta bur rtogs so/ /'jig rten na srid pa ri dang / tshal dang / gtsang po dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho la sogs
pa chu thams cad kyang me'i bskal pa chen po byung ba'i tshe thams cad tshig cing zad par 'gyur yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi ma gtogs ta/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid du shes na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni/ shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na/ phyogs
bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gtsang po dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri dang / tshal dang / klu dang / lung pa
dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang phyin cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung dang / me dang / sa dang / chu dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / gza' dang / ri dang / tshal
dang / chu dang / shing dang / lha'i pho brang dang / klu'i pho brang yang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul nus te/ de bas na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni/ shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya/
bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sprul nus so/ /dga' bo/ /maud+gal gyi bu chen po ting nge
'dzin du zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul cing ting nge 'dzin gyis sa chen po 'di'ang mgal me bskor ba bzhin du bskyod nus te/ mang du thos pas ni/
de ltar mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod sa chen po sgul cig cas bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin
ma mchis pas sgul rngo mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ma thob kyang mang du thos
pa las khri phrag brgya stong gis 'phags so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhig thams cad mang du thos bar rlom pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin mchog go /zhes gsungs pa thos nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag mang du thos pa bslab ste mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang khod du chud pas
rgyal khams chen po bcu drug snyed kyang bdag cag la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gus shing bkur sti bgyi na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa ni/ nam yang bla
na med pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong lnga brgya po mthun par dus gcig tu bdag cag ni/ mang du
thos pa spang zhing bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la slob bo zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong /khyed mang
du thos pa spangs te bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go/ zhes ma smra zhig/ ngas bltas na/ khyed kyi shes rab ni/ sbrang bu'i 'dab mas nyi zla sgrib par 'dod pa dang /
dmus long gis ri rab lhun po la 'dzeg par 'dod pa dang / gru gzings med par rgya mtsho la rgal bar 'dod pa dang / bya 'dab ma chag pa nam mkha' la 'phur 'dod pa
bzhin khyed kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams shi ba tsam du 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod ma 'jigs ma skrag par sems ting nge 'dzin la zhog cig /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag la bsam gtan gyi
mthu'ang ma mchis na/ ting nge 'dzin du ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga la sman dam pa yod de/ khyed ting nge 'dzin thob par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal
pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bdag cag gis de bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| sman dam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsal pa/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa
dang / spong ba ci lags bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dang po'i sems ni/ rtog pa
zhes bya| sems gnyis byung ba ni/ bsal ba zhes bya/ sems gsum byung ba ni/ 'jug pa zhes bya/ sems bzhi byung ba ni/ spong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ bsam
gtan dang po la rtog pa zhes bya/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsal ba zhes bya/ bsam gtan gsum pa la 'jug pa zhes bya/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la spong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan
yang 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa yin te/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bzhi dang / chos thams cad ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / bden pa bzhi
dang / ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang / mtshan ma med pa bzhi dang / byang chub bzhi yin na/ dge slong khyed bsam gtan dang po'ang gsal bar ma rtogs na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
chos thams cad lta ci smos/ dge slong dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/ /gal te mi gtsang ba la rtog na/ lus
kyi chen po bzhi bags pa dang / rus pa dang / tshigs pa dang / rang khrag zags pa dang / snod pu ga dgu yod pa'i nang du chu blugs na zag pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba'i dngos po
bshad gci che chung dang / btsog pha shin tu skyor rung ba zag pa mthong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin de las kyang dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ba ni/ 'di ltar g.yo ba dang / gnas pa
dang / rnam par sdos pa dang / rnam par ser ba dang / rnam par dkar ba dang / rnam par nag pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mthong bas sems ma 'khrul bar gyur na/ dngos po de dag
mthong ba'i tshe phyir bzlog par bya'o/ /rus pa dkar po dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bgrang ba'i rtog pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang /
dge slong mas rtsa ba brgyad nyams pa dang / dge ba snyen mas khrims kyi rtsa ba lnga nyams pa dang / dge tshul gyis khrims bcu nyams pa dang / dge slong mas lci ba drug nyams
ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi spyi'i dkor brkus pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / pha ma dang / dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /
phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni/ bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i tshe bdag gi lus dang / ngag rlung nag po lta bu dang / khrag ni/ me rab tu
'bar ba 'dra ba dang / rus pa ni/ ri dang brag lta bu dang / rtswa ni/ shing lta bu dang / nang grol lnga ni/ sprul lam rtsangs pa lta bur mthong ba dang / lag na me chen po thogs te rlung chen
po la rgyug pa dang / mgo la ri chen po khyer zhing langs kyang rdab 'chos pa dang / kha nas seng+ge 'byung ba dang / mig nas 'bar ba mo 'byung ba dang / sna nas sbrul chen po 'byung ba
dang / rna ba nas 'phar spyad 'byung ba dang / bshang gci che chung chu lta bur 'bab cing rgya mtsho lta bur mthong ba dang / gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa
mang po ston pa mthong na/ mtshan ma de lta bu mthong ba'i tshe bsam gtan las langs te tshal lam ri dgon bar song ste phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'don cing 'gyod tshangs bya'o/ /
de ltar sngon gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig 'gyod tshangs bya ba'ang zhag bdun nam/ bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mam/ bdun lnga'am/ bdun drug gam/ bdun
bdun gyi bar du mthol tshangs bya'o/ /de ltar sdig sbyangs nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/ de la sdig chung ba ni/ bags kyis bdag gi lus bai DUR+ya'i ri lta bur mthong bar
'gyur ro/ /gang rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams pa nas rang bzhin gyi khrims lci ba lnga'i bar du ma nyams pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
dus gcig tu chos ston pa dang / de yang na bden pa bzhi'am/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bzod pa'am/ spyi bo
dang / 'jig rten mchog gi chos ston pa dang / yang na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / skyes bu ya brgyad kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid bzhi dang / ting nge
'dzin gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin las mun nag mthong ba dang / snang ba mthong na/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te shin tu dga'
ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag phyir gnas pa'i tshal du dong ste bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin nyin zhag bdun bsgoms pas thams cad
kyis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ sangs rgyas kyis
bstan pa bzhin 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar thob na cho 'phrul bstan pa'i dus la bab bo/ /zhes
bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya rnams steng gi bar snang la 'phags te nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lus la me dang / chu la sogs pa 'byung ba'i cho
'phrul rnam pa bco brgyad mngon par bstan te/ de'i tshe mang du thos pa'i dge slong rnams bsam gtan bsgoms pas maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang 'dra bar rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad par gyur to/ /
de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos 'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas ji srid du gnas shing dus
ngan pa'i tshe sems can ji snyed cig chos 'di bsgoms pas/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ da da phyin chad dpyid
zla 'bring po la rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du mya ngan las 'da'o/ /nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad cu'i bar du chos la spyod pa'i sems can mang du 'byung ste/ dur khrod dang shing drung
na gnas shing 'di yid la byed de/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba'i chos spyod pa stong phrag bcu la stong phrag dgus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur
ro| |lo sum brgya'i bar du ni/ sems can stong phrag brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lo sum brgya phan chad/ lo lnga brgya tshun chad ni/
nga'i nye gnas rnams bags kyis mi dge ba'i chos spyod do/ /phrag dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag lnga brgya la stong phrag
bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob bo/ /lo lnga brgya phan chad/ brgyad brgya tshun chad nga'i nye gnas rnams khyim pa'i gos gyon nas ba lang dang / lug dang / byi la dang / bong bu
dang / rta gso zhing 'bru mang po gsog ste/ rang gi lag dar zhing rang za ba dang / bran pho dang / bran mo'ang gso bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe stong phrag stong la stong phrag gcig gis
dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ /lo brgyad brgya phan chad nas lo stong tshun chad ni/ nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos bslab ste/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag la grogs por bsten cing phan tshun tha na 'phrin gyis 'drul zhing / zhing rmo brko byed de/ 'bru gzan mang po dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
rin po che sna bdun gsog cing sha za zhing chang 'thung ste chen po bzhi gso zhing rtas par byed pa dang / smad tshong ma ltar gos spu gu gyon zhing 'drid pa dang / slu ba'i las byed
de| de la 'bum phrag khri la brgya tsam zhig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob bo/ /lo stong phan chad/ sum brgya tshun chad ni/ che thang du 'khrugs te/ nga'i nye gnas rnams
lus chos gos gyon yang shing gi kha la 'phan rnying btags pa 'dra ste/ gzi byin yang med/ khyim pas mthong na'ang bkur sti mi byed pas sha na pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus
na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te/ gcig la gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo'ang gcig la gcig dgra byed de/ byams
pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems kyang med pas bza' ba dang / btung bas nyon mongs te/ khyim thab med pa dang / chung ma med pa dang / bu pho med pa dang / bu mo med pa dang / long
ba dang / 'on pa dang / lkugs pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / bran pho dang / bran mo las bros pa/ yul khams phung bar byed pa/ 'tsho bas rang mi sos pa dag nga'i chos la zhugs
nas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rngon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i glang dang / rta rgod dam/ bal glang myos pa ltar gdul dka' ba/ rang dgar yang 'gro ba/ slob dpon
dang / slob ma'ang mi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste/ 'dod chags la bag med par spyod cing / bla ma dang / 'og ma'i rim pa'ang med pa dang / bzang ngan gyi rim pa'ang med de/ dud
'gro phyugs dang 'dra ba/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed cing ngan song gsum gyis mi 'jigs par gar song bar gnas kyang chang tshong ba dang / shan pa dang / rngon pa dang /
smad tshong ma dang sten cing 'grogs pa/ kha nas kyang ngag sdig pa smra zhing sems la'ang sdig pa sems pa dang / yang na blon po dang sten cing dge ba'i mi dag la
thabs sna tshogs kyis bsdigs shing nor 'phrog ste bu smad gso'o/ /yang na rngon pa'i yo byad nya rgya la sogs pa 'chang zhing nya la sogs pa bcus nas rang gi lag bdar te
gsod pa dang / sreg pa dang / zla ba nya ba dang / shi ba'i tshe gso sbyong mi byed de rang nyams su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi las byed pa rnams phan tshun rtsod cing / bla ma dang /
'og ma dang / grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang / gdug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma'ang gcig la gcig skyon 'dru zhing 'phya ba dang / sgrog pa'i gtam
smra ste| dper na/ rtsangs pa mang po kun gcig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang / phan tshun dpung dang sde tshan gcig la gcig tshig ngan gyis sma 'bebs pa dang / bla 'og gi
rim pa'ang med pa dang / mi rgod ma rungs pa ltar dge ba byed pa las 'phrog rlom byed pa dang / khe dang grags pa la chags te chos mi shes par gyur pa de'i tshe mdo sde bcu
gnyis kyang nub par gyur te klog pa dang / 'don pa'ang med pa dang / de'i slob ma rnams kyang dgra chos dang / gtsug lag dang / yi ge dang / rtse ba dang / bzhon pa dang / bon
chos dang / mig mang dang / glu gar dang / 'du ba dang / sbyugs pa dang / 'phong rtsal dang / rta rgyug pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa slob cing spyod de/ de ltar ma legs pa'i chos
spyod pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du lhung ste/ bskal pa grangs med par ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong nas de las thar nas yang byol song du skye ste/ ltogs pa dang /
skom pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / khal lci ba 'gal zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa'ang chos ma yin pa mang du byed de/ ri dang /
tshal dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung na mi gnas shing rtag tu grong du rgyug ste/ sems la rtog pa mang zhing khe dang grags pa tshol te/ nor rdzas dang / longs spyod la chags
shing chog mi shes pa dang / chos ston pa'i bshad mkhan zhig yin na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa'ang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang thog tu mi phebs te/ 'khor mang po dang
'grogs nas grong rgyu zhing khyim pa'i khyim du zhugs nas khyim pa la chos ston pa'ang khe dang grags pa'i phyir te/ longs spyod mang du gsog cing shan pa dang 'dra'o/ /sha dang
chang la mi spyod pa dag gis dge slong dag/ khyed ni/ btsun pa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yin na/ snying rje'i sems kyang med de/ 'di ltar chos ma yin pa mang du
spyod pas khyed ni/ shan pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes spyod zhing brgyad par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong de dag de skad gshe ba thos nas kun log ste/ de la rdeg pa dang /
gshe ba dang / brgyad bkag ste gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni/ nged sha dang chang 'thung ba ma gnang ste/ da nged de bzhin
gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas da ni/ ci'ang gnang ba deng sha dang chang 'thung ba yin no/ /khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig la gcig bdag cag gis shes
pa ni| sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes smra zhing / la la ni/ tshig kyal pa dang / don med pa'i tshig dang / 'gran dor gyi tshig dang / 'khrul pa'i tshig tu gtam
smra zhing dper na/ dmus long zhig mdzub mo gnyis nyi ma la btsugs te/ nyi ma ya gi ni/ byin chung ngo / /yangs so/ /dog go / zhes smra ba'am/ mi 'on pa zhig bdag gis gnam
gyi steng na chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so/ /zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar dmus long mang po tshogs te 'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang / 'od srung chen po la sogs pa sprul te/ de'i nang
na bzhugs kyang kun gyis rdeg cing gshe ste/ de nas skrod cing 'dug tu mi ster ro/ /gzhan yang dper na/ seng+ge ni/ spos kyi ri la gnas te/ ri dwags dang / gcan gzan gang
yang gnas der nye mi bzod do/ /seng+ge ri de las byung ste song ba'i 'og tu ni/ gcan gzan gdug pa khro ba la sogs pa gcig gis gcig bos te spos kyi ri la lhags nas 'bras bu
zhim po za zhing chu mig la 'thung ngo / /de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las thams cad bskams shing med par gyur te/ spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyo ba par mi 'gyur bas rtswa
gdug pa skyes te zos ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ro/ /nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad kyis ngas bstan pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'don cing klog pa'ang
gong ma ni/ bar du bcug/ bar ma ni/ 'og tu bcug/ 'og ma ni/ gong du bcug/ bar ma ni/ 'og dang / tha mar bcug ste/ don ma yin pa la don zhes zer/ don la ni/ don ma
yin zhes zer te/ ji ltar mu stegs can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni/ bden pa yin no/ /zhes zer ba dang 'dra'o/ /de'i dus na mdo sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang gzi
brjid dang / mthu med do/ /la la zhig 'don tam klog kyang mi gcig 'ga' yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa med do/ /de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid stor
pa'am/ bya 'dab ma med pa dang 'dra ste/ gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten yang stongs shing zhig ral gso ba'ang med do/ /de ltar sku gzugs dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i
gdugs yod pa'ang dgra cha zhig pa dang 'dra ste/ phug ron dang / bye'u dang / phag dang / khyi dang / lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang / gnas su 'gyur ro/ /dge
slong so so na 'dug pa'i gnas ni/ byi dor bzang du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di'ang khyed la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yin no/ /dga'
bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te ngus so/ /de ltar dga' bos yid gdung zhing du ba ma btang ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa| khyod de ltar ma du bar mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel cig/ de nas dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la bdag
gis gzungs su gzung ngo / /zhes gsol to/ /brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste/
gang zhig mdo sde 'di ri'am/ tshal lam/ shing drung ngam/ pas mtha' ma/ dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam/ klog na/ bdag cag gis lha dang mi'i 'khor dang / mi ma yin
ba dang bcas te gnas der 'gro zhing chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig tsam yang mi brjed mi nyams par gzung ngo / /zhes gsol to/ /mdo sde 'di
gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong stong snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par gyur to/ /dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen lnga brgya
yongs su dag par gyur te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong ngo / /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA san ni pA ta rat+na ke tu d+hA ra NI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo| bam po dang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la phyag btsas te bdud kyi 'khor
gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i zungs 'di sbyor bar bgyi'i/ bdag gis rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ a bA me a bA me/ aM ba re/ aM ba re/ pa ru kun dza
na Ta na Ta pu ska ra ba ha dza lu kha/ kha ma kha ya/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ kirti ba ra/ mu dre mu dra mu khe swAhA/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
zad pa| nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen
po| |bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
grol ba| sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
chen po la 'di lta ste/ lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros
gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dri med gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad kyang bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye
shes can/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa/ shes pa la
mkhas pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thabs shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag dang mang thabs cig go/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na kun tu rgyu
mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ g.yog lnga brgyad dang / gcig gi ming ni/ nye rgyal/ gcig gi ming ni/ pang nas skyes zhes bya ba
gnyis shig 'khod do/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo/ /g.yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa des gcig la gcig spran to/ /zhes
dam tshig byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi
phyir zhugs pa dang / kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas de
'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dge slong 'di spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni/ bdag gis sngon chad dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ mir gyur pa gzhan su la'ang gang la'ang sngon ma mthong
na| bdag de'i gan du song ste tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ gang las rab tu byung / gang gi chos la dga' zhes 'dri'o/ /snyam nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal
tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna
tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi ston
pa gang / gang las rab tu byung / gang gi chos la dga'/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shAkya'i sras po brtul zhugs dka'
thub chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang dang ldan/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya sad mdzad mi mnyam
sdug bsngal mtsho skem da ltar 'di na yod/ /dri ma med pa de yi skyabs su rtag par nga song de yi chos la dga'/ /nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra/ ji
skad ston/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten las
dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang / /las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/ /gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par
mi gnas pa/ /thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig
rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te/ des na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyis
ni shin tu rnyed dka' thos rnyed bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa/ /'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'bab chu skem par bden pa khong du chud/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar
'gyur ba ste/ /lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams sgom pa mi nyams byed pa yin/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan
'das ni/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ ral pa can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
so| |nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ bdag gi grogs po'i mchog dang / slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas kun tu
rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te slar song nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ba dang /
kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi dbang po
rnams ni/ dwangs/ bzhin gyi mdangs ni/ yongs su dag /pags pa'i mdog ni/ kun tu dkar ba las ni/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed do/ /nye rgyal gyis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa/ de de bzhin te/ kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / kho bos ci rnyed pa khyod la bshad do/ /
de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing / /phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba/ /mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig
dang | |yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par bya/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang //
las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/ /gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ /thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de
yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/ /pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med pa zhi ba'i chos/ /nyon mongs lta ngan nyes pa thams cad zhi byed mi shes
gcod pa dang / /'di ni 'dus byas gsog gsob de phyir stong pa slu bar thub pas gsungs/ /de thos zhi ba reg 'gyur dri ma med pa'i tshig de zlos te gsungs/ /nye rgyal gyis smras pa/
ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang / /las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs/ /gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i
sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/ /thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs/ /de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos kyi
mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/ nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par sbyangs te/ de nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu
bo sgrol ba zhi ba mgyogs pa'i gzings/ /ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi byed 'khor lo'i pha rol 'gro/ /'di ni yongs su shes na nyon mongs phung
po 'joms zhing bdud 'dul 'gyur/ /thar pa 'di ni dgra dang 'thab mo bsal cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skem/ /pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ /nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes thos na/
bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung ngam/ pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de de bzhin te/ bdag cag gi 'khor la bltas te rab tu
'byung ngo / /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can gyis yul ang+ga ma
ga d+ha na mkhas shing snyan pa dang / brjod pa dang / grags par ldan pa skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu
'byung bar 'dod do/ /zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems so/ /kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i slob mar gyur na/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul stongs par byed par 'gyur gyi/
bdag der song ste skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog la/ sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du 'jug go /snyam ste/ de nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bdud
sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa nas mi snang bar byas te tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bsgyur nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam
gar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste/ /khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir/ /smras pa de dag
thams cad don yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod/ /myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod
rtsed mo byos/ /skye rga na 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med/ /bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las bskyed 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med/ /rnyed phyir 'dir
ni shAkya'i bu yis smras kyi dad pas ma 'gro zhig /de nas nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu byung ba las bzlog
pa'i phyir 'ongs so/ /snyam nas de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon
cig 'khor ba'i skyon/ /dran par gyis la 'jig rten rga ba yis/ /gzir zhing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba/ /de gnyis spang phyir rab byung legs par gzung / /de nas
pang nas skyes kyis bdud la slar smras pa/ mkhas pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyi/ /rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros
'di las bskyod nus su yang med/ /sred pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag cag brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad/ /seng+ge'i gzugs can wa yi tshig gis nged kyi blo gros ma sgyur
cig/ bden pa mthong ba'i lha gang dag nam mkha' la 'dug pa de dag gis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed gnyis legs
so| |legs so/ /'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam yin te/ lam 'di ni/ sdug
bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o/ /lam 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo/ /de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste yid la gcags
nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo / /de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag /nged ni/
rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par chas kyi/ khyed kyis shes par gyis shig /
khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni/ 'di nas phyir log gcig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di
skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthun/ khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/ khyed gang las rab tu 'byung ba de las bdag cag
kyang rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis
rig nas ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gan du 'gro mi nus par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi logs su g.yang sa chen po zabs su dpag tshad
brgya pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ ci nas kun du rgyu
nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis g.yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do/ /yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa/
sra ba ma bsnyil ba/ sul med pa/ gcig tu stug por gyur pa/ mkhregs pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te/ seng+ge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/ sgra
chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de'ang ma mthong / seng+ge'ang ma
mthong | seng+ge'i skad kyang ma thos te lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing
mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed skyes bu dam pa/ tshogs kyi gtso bo/ g.yog
gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis
g.yog dang bcas pa nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas gcig ni/ nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /gcig ni/ rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur
ro| |de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan dang shes rab 'jigs med par/ /mi mchog
phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te/ /bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang bskyed nas bsu/ /de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas dge slong mang po dang / /khyim na gnas pa dang / rab
tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsus nas bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par spyad pa spyod
do| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed gnyis kyi ming ci/ nye rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bdag ni/ bram ze rgyal gyi bu lags te/ nye rgyal zhes bgyi/ bdag gi
ma'i ming ni/ shA ri ka ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni/ shA ri'i bu zhes btags so/ /bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas
gnang lags so/ /pang nas skyes kyis gsol pa/ bdag gi pha'i ming ni/ kauN+Di n+ya zhes bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming ni/ maud+gal zhes bgyi ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad
du bdag gi ming ni/ maud+gal gyi bu zhes btags so/ /bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu nga'i thad du
g.yog dang bcas te tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /
shA ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas
