'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag/ khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yi/ nyon cig /de dag gis gcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs
kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/ /'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med/ /smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther
zug med/ /chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes/ /sdug bsngal chos gzir byas pa thams cad gar chags pa/ /reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med/ /
ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam sgom sten byed pa/ /de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med/ /chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa
dge /bdag med ldan las spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag /srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med/ /bdud kyi g.yo dag mthong la sems ni byang chub bsngos/ /nam
mkha'i glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung / /reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de/ /tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /byis pa'i sde rnams
bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug /phung por thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med/ /yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral/ /byang chub lam spyod der ni
'dren pas byang chub brnyes/ /rmongs med chos nyid 'di ni chos su skyob pas gsungs/ /'di lta ste/ su mun de/ bi mun de/ sun da dza ti/ si li si li si li/ a ba si li/ a ba ha
si li| ta thA tA si li/ b+hu ta ko Ti si li swAhA/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /
de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos/ /gti mug mi shes dngos
pos sdig las ci bgyis pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags nas/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs/ /bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams
cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go /yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang gi dbus
der dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/ srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni/ byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug /maud+gal gyi bu chen po ni/ nub phyogs su bltas
te 'dug /gang po ni/ lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug /rab 'byor ni/ shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do/ /nyan thos chen po bzhi

po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na khyu lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad+ma chu ba ni/ dzam+bu'i chu po'i gser/ /'dab ma ni/ baiDUR+ya sngon po/ /ze ba ni/ dpal gyi snying po/ /snying po ni/ mu tig /dri ni/ lha'i
spos pas lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ pad+mo de las snang ba byung ngo / /snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar

gyur te/ srang de na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo / /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
lha'i nang du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang du ni/ dpag tshad brgya bar snang ngo / /'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo / /pad+ma de'i
'dab ma dag las tshig dang / don dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la ngas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos so/ /sangs rgyas
zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa/ /gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
bskor| |nyag cig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med/ /mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don mthar 'dod pa/ /tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog
'dir ston pas btul/ /'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba che/ /thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de ring gshegs/ /dus gsum gshegs pa
ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang / /tshad med chos don rig pa mi dang lhar bcas 'gro ba skyob/ /'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron/ /dam chos
gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston/ /sdug bsngal phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing / /'jig rten don slad mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas sbyang / /ma rig
pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang / /dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs 'gyur gyi/ /don gyi dam pa gzigs
pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la/ /stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa/ /smra ba'i seng+ge ring po mi thogs 'dir gshegs so/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya
mtshor gnas pa gzigs nas ni/ /dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing / /mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba/ /de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du
yang dag gshegs/ /dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa/ /don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po/ /pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/ /
drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng+ge 'dir gshegs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod//
bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgribs/ /rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos/ /bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed/ /'dod pas mi rtag chu yi zla ba
bzhin| |skye rgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra/ /dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa/ /nam yang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug /dge dang
mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam/ /rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing / /khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs/ /sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag
yod la| |sten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang srungs/ /'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong / /song ste de yi bka'
la rab tu nyon/ /legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te/ /shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/ /dam pa'i chos ldan mnyan pa don chen ni/ /lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma de'i
'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo / /mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med/ /rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms/ /ma 'khrul
sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas/ /zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig /rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi/ /bzod pa mchog la rnam par sgom par gyis/ /des
ni na dang rga las thar pa yi/ /shin tu rnam thar myur du thos par 'gyur/ /gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog srog la chags/ /ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por lta/ /de dag gi
ni skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad/ /de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu bab/ /rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing / /byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas/ /rjes su
mthun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa/ /de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur/ /skye dang 'jig grol chos 'di thams cad la/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa/ /de dag 'chi med rga
med na ba'ang med/ /ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med/ /gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags/ /lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin/ /da ltar shAkya seng+ge 'di bzhin du/ /
bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'joms par 'gyur/ /gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang phyir/ /ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa/ /tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa
rnams| |de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do/ /bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par/ /chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su/ /smon pa spangs ni bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub
nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur/ /de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor
bar 'dug go /'og min gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor khor yug tu 'khod do/ /bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su
bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang ga dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad ba dag byung ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med ba dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khor par mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
drug gi gnas thams cad na'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can rab
tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te spu bring zhes byed par gyur cing / lus rdul te lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te bdud gzhan la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la/ /nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med/ /mthu stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de/ /skye bo brtan phyir 'jig rten
'dir 'dug go /lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste/ /'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong / /bde gshags tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'/ /yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i
lam du 'gro /'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te/ /lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor bar 'dug /da ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char phab
ste| |ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gi/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig
khyod kyi chos rig na/ /bdag sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro /bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs
'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu du zhing gdong mchog tu khro bas non pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam
dman pa/ /bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes sam/ /'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod bsngo ba/ /ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am/ /bdag cag ste bas ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /pad+ma'i drung du nye bar der 'dong ste/ /chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag /bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/ /lus ni dri nga
stobs dang brtson 'grus stor/ /ji tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa/ /de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong / /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /
sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed dga'/ /sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog /grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag myur du dga' zhing
dad pas blta/ /'jig rten gsum mchod srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dod/ /de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen pos 'di skad ces smras
so| |khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan nga yi tshig nyon cig /sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ngag yid mthun spyod de/ /khro spangs rab dga'
thub pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dad skyed/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs dong de ring gus par mchod/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha'
las babs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te bdud la la ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do/ /la la ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni/ dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ sred
med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/
la la ni/ gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la ni/ yul 'khor
srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni/ rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ nyi ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ lha ma yin gyi cha
byad du| la la ni/ nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni/ mi'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ lto 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ /la la ni/ rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ gser gyi rgyan gyi cha
byad du| la la ni/ nor bu rin po che'i cha bya byad du/ la la ni/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni/ gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/
la la ni| 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ glang po rin po ches srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha
byad du| la la ni/ bud med rin po che'i che byad du/ la la ni/ tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni/ blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /la la ni/ sngo zhing kha dog sngo la 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ /la la ni/ dkar zhing kha
dog dkar la 'phyang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang ser bo dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do/ /la la ni/ le brgan kha
dog le brgan la gser gyi gos dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing ga thogs shing 'khod do/ /la
la ni| dmar zhing kha dog dmar la mu tig dkar po'i char 'phebs so/ /la la ni/ dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar bo'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni/ lha'i drang srong gi
kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so/ /la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul
nas nam mkha' las lha'i spros sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so/ /la la ni/ dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo / /la la ni/ lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna
tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'debs so/ /la la ni/ mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed do/ /la la ni/ lha'i
bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to/ /la la ni/ kha dog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/ /bdud
dang / bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
thogs so/ /la la ni/ srang dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo
dang / shing dang / gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe bdud de dag
thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag la phyin chad
grogs med de/ /bdag gi dpal ded thams cad stor/ /bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams/ /brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya/ /bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad/ /pad+ma bcad dang kun
'khrugs te/ /des na sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro/ /de ni tha ma'i stobs yin no/ /bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsam nas rlung lta bur nam mkha'i las babs te srang gi pad+ma ga la ba
der phyin nas pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na/ reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcang par 'dod na/ de dag kyang ma mthong / pad+ma'i snying po lag pas brdab par
'dod na/ de'ang ma dmigs te/ dper na/ grog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad+mo de'ang snang mod kyi mi dmigs
so| |gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe 'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad
drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na/ de'ang ma nus so/ /yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na/
reg par yang ma nus te mi dmigs so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung
zhing mi dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dud pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o/ /snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs
shing reg par yang ma nus so/ /de nas bdud sdig can rab tu du zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te gdong mchi ma can gyi sa phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad
ces smras so/ /dge sbyong gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas/ /'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir bslad bzhin skad cig myos par song / /yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams
shing bdag gi srog kyang zad/ /des bskrad brlags par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro /bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ /rab tu skrag
cing dus nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gi /
'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzed kyi pha rol tu 'chi
pa'i dus bya'o/ /snyam na/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong nas
rab tu khros shing skrag ste skad chen por du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa
zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci phyir khyed deng mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra chen 'bod/ /'gro ba kun
gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song / /'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba/ /'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur
yang dag /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi tshig snyan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su song la/ bcings pa 'di las bdag grol par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam ste/ de nas
bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang
rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las rab tu thar par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /thub
mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcing ba 'di las khrol/ /de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso bo mchog skyabs bdag mchis te/ /gti mug gis ni bdag ldongs khyod la khros
shing nongs chen gyis/ /mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi/ /gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs
su song ba de'i tshen bdag grol ba snyam du shes so/ /yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam pa de'i tshe'ang mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis
shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so/ /lan bdun gyi bar
du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug go /'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// //bam po
bzhi pa| gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir sod ba bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong / glu long na
shig /dge sbyong / gar byos shig ces sbyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i
dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchog mya
ngan med bzhugs kyang / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te/ /nyan thos de dag la ni kyal ka deng byas pa/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der lhags te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ /bstan pa'i
cho ga bsrung slad du/ /kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste/ /bzhon dpung bcas pa'i
bdud btul la/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyang / /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya/ /de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| ma gshegs cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu'i yul bsam gyis
mi khyab| las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bya ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba
khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mo dral ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/
'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsad par shom
yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod par mi nus so/ /ngas ni/ 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pa ma par bya ba dang / gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog
dang bcas pa 'di ni/ ma gtogs so/ /yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ yongs su spyod do/ /de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung ba'i lha mo mthu
mdzes zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ /grong khyer 'di
dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams/ /re re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa/ /bye bas smra ba'i seng+ge bskor cing mchis/ /zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te/ /khyod dkrongs slad du 'khrugs
pa'i sems kyis gnas/ /mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs/ /'jig rten rtsa lag brlags par ma bzhud cig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sdig can
dag ni lnga stong po/ /mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni/ /bsam med de dag khyod la bsngo/ /thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas
byung ba de'i che sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten sgron ma brlags gyur na/ /
kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing / /chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig / chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur/ /'gro ba 'dir ni nyon
mongs g.yo can gdug pas shin tu gtams/ /sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rungs 'gyur ba las/ /ji ltar shin tu 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis/ /khyod
brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang po dag /sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung slad bdag gi tshig
gsan te/ /stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang / de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes
bya ba de snying rje snying brtse bar du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rungs gyur na
ni| |mgon po khams gsum 'di dag de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing / /khyod dkrongs slad du kha nas me
'bar rgyu yid ni der ma gshegs/ /de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po/ /mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta/ /gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong
phrag nyi shu rnams/ /khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyi gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i
lha mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher du zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan shul 'di seng+ge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bsgor/ /dge slong rnams la gtse slad bdud kyis rnam mang gnod pa bgyid/ /sa 'dir
ston pa khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson/ /sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig /bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig
dang / /sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas/ /lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams/ /kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /dam chos cher zhig
pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs gyur dang / /nam mkha' skar ma'i 'od stong nyi zla gyur mthong nas/ /'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdob/ /bde gshegs ma rungs 'gyur bar kun
dogs kyi hud mchi/ /mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing / /chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag /chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur/ /dam chos
spyod pa 'jig rten du/ /ma rungs 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe/ /mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang / /'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma
mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol/ /smra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig /bdag gi grong du ma
rungs khyod gyur na| /'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi/ /'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog /bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud/ /sems can thugs
brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te/ /sems can skye bas gtses pa 'jigs thar mdzod/ /dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar/ /sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas
dgongs/ /sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs/ /srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig /sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs/ /kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i
byis pa'i sde/ /de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod/ /skye mchod dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / de nas sa'i lha mo gzi
brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra bshig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu
sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhin gtams pa yi khrag stsal cing / /dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam/ /spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma rnyed stsal to/ /sngon ni rin chen rnam pa
sna tshogs dang / /sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta/ /gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang / /de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal/ /rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa
mdzad| |khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs/ /bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen/ /phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no/ /bya ba
dka' pa dag kyang mtha' yas spyad/ /sems can du ma nyon mongs thar bar mdzad/ /gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni/ /lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig /chu
po chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral/ /'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/ /sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal par bya/ /sems can mang po 'jig med grong khyer gzud/ /
sems can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing / /byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod/ /'di na lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams/ /tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod
par mdzod/ /'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por chos bstan te/ /mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol/ /'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi
chu yis khrus/ /mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/ /bdag grol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzad/ /srid gsum rgya mtsho
las kyang 'gro ba sgrol/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig /rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang nas gshegs pa dang /
skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag rnams
kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba/ /zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul/ /chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na/ /de la de lta bu yi bgegs ma byung / /ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus
ngan la| |rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te/ /thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing / smra ba'i seng+ge 'di na bzhugs
bzhin du/ /sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po/ /de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa/ /de dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa/ /'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor/ /de ring ma rungs
bar ni gyur ta re/ /de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad/ /shin tu sems can don mdzad spyad/ /de ni de ring grong
khyer 'dir/ /brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go /yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
khrag khrig brgya stong gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung nag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas
bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni/ skra 'bal/ la la ni/ rgyan 'gro la/ la la ni/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan snyol/ la la ni/ bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdob/
la la ni| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ /la la ni/ shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni/ lag pas brang rdung / la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so
bya bzhin du 'gro ldog /la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro/ /de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang
pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi/ /bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad/ /zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod
skyes kyi| |btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol/ /sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung du mdzad/ /lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung / /shin
tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs pa/ /srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol/ /dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te/ /bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur
ba'i sems can du ma la/ /khyod kyi thugs rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la/ /chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral bar mdzod/ /'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing / /'khor
ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba/ /de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston/ /'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba/ /de ni khyod kyi
thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad/ /rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnam
'dren brgya lam rungs gyur na ni/ /'jig rten 'di ltar ma lus ldongs par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad lam rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu/ /'dir ni yong ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur/ /bdag
lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag /bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ /de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma gyur cig /
yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang / /thub
pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni/ /ma rungs mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig /dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur/ /dpag tshad sum
cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas kun tu bskor/ /sna bgrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde/ /byang chub snying por lhags de de dag 'jigs
shing brlags gyur na/ /da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la bgegs shig byed/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi
sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che/ /'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin tu dpung che bas/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs/ /de brlags
na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin tu snang med 'khyams par 'ong / /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gsan te/ /dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo thugs rje can/ /lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs/ /de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor
cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /deng khyod ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag cig /bdud rnams thams cad bzhon bcas gcig car du/ /tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na/ /nga yi lus kun la
ni smos ci dgos/ /deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste/ /nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do/ /lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis/ /dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan
bya| |ngas sngon bya ba dka' ba mang po byas/ /zas dang skom yang shin tu rgya cher byin/ /gnas dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas/ /nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus/ /ngas ni rta
dang glang chen shing rta dang / /lhab lhub 'phyang 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang / /bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang / /nga la su zhig gnod par byed par nus/ /chung ma bu pho bu
mo bran mang dang / /yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal po'i rigs/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin rlob/ /nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur/ /mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig
gnyis dang / /lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas/ /nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang / /su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la/ /
gus ldan bdag gi lag nas shin tu mchod/ /rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'/ /nga la su zhig rlag par byed par nus/ /ngas sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams/ /mnyam
par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas/ /lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na/ /nga la rnam par 'tshe ba su zhig nus/ /nyon mongs ngas brtul nges par nga
sangs rgyas/ /sems can thams cad la ni byams sems ldan/ /khro med kha dog tha ba nga la med/ /nga yi mdun na de ring su zhig nus/ /ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs
pa btul/ /ngas ni bdud mang bye ba pham par byas/ /khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya/ /grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig /sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di
dag na| |sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun na bsags/ /zhing rnams
mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya/ /bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya/ /sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas dag gi dgongs pa'i mdzad
pa bya| |yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i grangs med pa'i
brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do/ /sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i
nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to/ /sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil to/ /skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do/ /'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa
bsal to/ /gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to/ /chu bo bzhi bskams so/ /chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi lam ston to/ /bzod pa dang des
pa la btsud do/ /bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas
pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to/ /sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do/ /de nas lha dang / mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog
dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so/ /lha'i
gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen
po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ro tsa na dang / ro tsa na chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+mas kun tu
g.yogs so/ /gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te lha'i ras bcos bu dang /
mu tig gi phreng ba dang / lag rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to/ /shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dwangs shing rnyog pa med la yan
lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang pa kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab bo/ /dngul dang bai DUR+ya'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang /
dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo/ /go shiR+sha dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang lam der phab bo/ /lha'i rgyan sna tshogs
gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to/ /grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do/ /grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag
bkod pa byas so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du
gshegs so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing
tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs par mthong ba nas gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred
med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los bsgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang
dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med
kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng+ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag lhas 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / gang
dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba nas gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam
nas gshegs par mthong ngo / /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam
nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag btsal te zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri
dang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas bcom ldan
'das drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam nas gshegs shing lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod
pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so/ /bden par 'di ni/ drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang / mis mchod par
snang ngo / /'di'i lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so/ /bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/ gang mkhas pa de la ngas
ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la/ 'di la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong
skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang / /ye shes chos don ldan
zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen/ /khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor/ /yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs
bshad mnyan/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog
dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyed su zhig /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni/ bram ze'o/ /gsol pa/ gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni/ gau ta ma'o/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/
nga'i brtul zhugs ni/ rnam par thar pa gsum mo/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do/ /
gsol pa/ khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no/ /gsol pa/ drang srong chen po/ /skar
ma'i bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o/ /'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/
de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang
srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang / nyi ma brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/ de la mdzub ni/ sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i
tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis par rig par bgyi'o/ /klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste/ mdzub bcu bzhi ni/ skar ma
rnams kyi gnas so/ /gang de dag na gda' ba ni/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la bcas pa de dang / de dag na gda'o/ /yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyi
yi thub pa chen po gson cig /smin drug la ni su btsas pa/ /de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/ /g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis/ /spu can nag la mdog kyang dmar/ /longs spyod bdog cing
grags dang ldan/ /mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/ /smin drug la ni skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so/ /gang zhig la ni sor bzhi na/ /sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de/ /snar
ma la ni skyes pa ste/ /shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'/ /mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan/ /dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs/ /dgra rnams
rtag par rab tu 'joms/ /mgul ba yi ni mdzub phyed na/ /gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba/ /de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/ /dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa
la| |g.yon pa skye ba gang mchis pa/ /lag la skyes pa khro ba ste/ /de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog /mtshan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis/ /nabs so la ni skyes pa ste/ /nor dang 'bru
rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/ /de ni shes pa'i rgyu yang chung / /ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes/ /mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/ /phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/ /nyi ma lta bur rab tu
mdzes| |dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang / /gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis/ /sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste/ /'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs thul/ /tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis//
skag la skyes te 'thab mo sred/ /tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde/ /de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o/ /'og gam brang ngam rgya ba cig na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra
ba gda'/ /mchu las skyes te nor dang ldan/ /btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/ /lte ba g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na/ /gang la rme 'dra gda' ba ni/ /de ni gre la skyes pa ste/ /ser sna che zhing
tshe yang thung / /lte ba man chad sor bzhin/ /gang la sme ba rab gda' ba/ /sbo la de skyes longs spyod can/ /khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi/ /me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag /sme ba
dmar po chu sor gda'/ /rku zhing g.yo can sgyu ma ste/ /bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan/ /gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni/ /gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang / /nag pa la ni skyes pa ste/ /
'dod chags glu gar dag tu dga'/ /mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni/ /sme ba dmar po rab tu gda'/ /sa ri la ni de skyes te/ /mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang / /brla gnyis kyi ni
mdzub gang na/ /sme ba dmar po de bzhin te/ /sa ga la ste shor ba mchog /skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/ /rtag tu bde la gnas
pa ste| |ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ /brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'/ /lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can/ /chos
dang longs spyod ldan ba'o/ /gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni/ /sme ba gda' ba snon la skyes/ /mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal/ /dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so/ /pus mo gnyis ka'i gong
na ni| |gang la rma chung gda' ba de/ /snubs la skyes te dbang thang can/ /myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid/ /chu stod la ni skyes pa dag /sme ba pus mo'i lhang na/ /sbyin pa bgyid cing
chos lam 'tshal/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /chu smad la ni su skyes pa/ /gru do la ni sme ba mchis/ /de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan/ /longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams//
sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni/ /gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag /de bzhin nad med sems can byams/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /sme ba nag po rje ngar la/ /gda' ba mon grur
skyes pa ste/ /de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung / /longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan/ /rje ngar la ni mdzub do na/ /sme ba nag po rab tu gda'/ /mon gre la skyes blun po ste/ /de ni chu yis
'chi bar 'gyur/ /rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na/ /rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la/ /blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid/ /de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid/ /gang la sme ba mdzub gong na/ /

khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang / /shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan/ /gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la/ /sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni/ /nam grur skyes pa ma rabs te/ /
'breg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang / /sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni/ /rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis/ /tha skar la ni de
skyes so| |rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni/ /bra nye la ste snying brtse med/ /gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can/ /shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi/ /gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi//
skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags/ /'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis/ /sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i spyod
yul can/ /byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/ /de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste/ /sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas/ /khyi dang sbrul dang rus spal dang / /srog chags gzhan
yang rnam mang po/ /skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa/ /de dag bde la brten pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang / /thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin/ /nga yang thams cad gzigs
pa na| |ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /drang srong mi
yi gzugs su ni/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gda'/ /khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na/ /lha'am 'on te khyod mi lags/ /gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni/ /tshangs

pa chen po bzhin du gda'/ /spyod pa'i gnas kyang tshul gyis ni/ /sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra/ /thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs/ /'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na/ /khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra//
khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing / /mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings//
de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus/ /bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan/ /yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing / /dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig /chos gsum rtogs
pa'i shes dang ldan/ /nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum/ /byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa/ /de tshe nga ni rab tu byung / /mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs/ /mtshan ma med pa rab tu bsgoms//
sems can med cing srog med pa/ /bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas/ /tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum/ /stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms/ /nga ni ye shes pha rol song / /nga yi
tshigs 'di gsungs pa med/ /gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par/ /byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa/ /de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs/ /ye shes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/ /
chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing / /rnam par smin pa 'dod med la/ /de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing / /pha rol tshu rol
mi brten par/ /yang dag mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med/ /dmigs pa
de ni rnam par spangs/ /chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la/ /rang gi sems la the tshom spongs/ /nam mkha'
'dra bar shes nas su/ /nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon sum du gyur to/ /de
nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las
pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /yon tan mtha'
yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa/ /khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/ /rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams
pas mngon 'phags pa/ /sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur ba'i/ /yon
tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par 'gyur/ /tha ma'i spyod pa byang
chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to/ /sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa/ /sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du
gsol| |bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mtsho bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi/ /ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi yi dam pa lung bstan gsol/ /sdug bsngal chu bo
'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon
tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag /de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi/ /drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun/ /dus
gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun/ /sangs
rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog /sems can thams cad nang zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skam par shog /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i
snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig /sems can gang dag bsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams/ /de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar
par shog /sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig /shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog /de dag sdig pa'i rnam
spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig /sems can thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog /sems can de kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal
gyur cig /thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog /bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char ba 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig /sems can
thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog / bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs ba cung zad ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol
te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags/ /bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig /rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mtshog bzhugs
mthong bar shog /bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi/ /sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi/ /sems
can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ /bskal bar zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par spyad par bgyi/ /gang du byang chub reg par
'gyur zhing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi/ /'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog /smra ba'i seng+ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams
thob par shog /'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol/ /'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/
me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhag pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig /sa rnams g.yo bar byed
cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog
de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas
rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim par byed par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la gtugs so/ /drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad
kyang yid skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to/ /gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/ bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar
gyur cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang / sa g.yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad
du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin
de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza'
dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po myur du longs la
nyon| |byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung / /mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing / /nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug /khyod ni 'jig
rten phan phyir ston dbang po/ /rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su/ /bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa/ /khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron
mar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na byang phyogs su sangs
rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de
lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni/
bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas
su 'gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar
ma la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par gyur to/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i

ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang
bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang / gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang / de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu
'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
por gshegs so/ /bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa
dang ldan pa bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyi grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de
dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to/ /bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam
mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang / skyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gser
dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ sil
snyan dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs ni/ dkrol nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de
ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba/ khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas zhugs te zhabs
g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig
rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag

dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi
bar nas bzung ste sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu
bsgor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang / spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me
tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa
dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan
de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos/ /byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod/ /khyod kyi 'khor
ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi/ /'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos/ /yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyi/ /g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la/ /'dir
ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos/ /byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med/ /'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs/ /bdud
stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de/ /de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor/ /grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad/ /dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad/ /'gro ba
sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas/ /byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston/ /rang byung mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs/ /de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la/ /de
ltar mdzes pa de dag rab bltas te/ /rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos/ /yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i chal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang /
nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la
gzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa
dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro
myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa
'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag ga las 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen
po 'di lta bu dag snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing rdul bsags pa
med ces bya ba'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtsig pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na shin tu lham me/
lhan ne| lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa
des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo / /sangs
rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa de la'ang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo / /der ni/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob
par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te skad cig
thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs
med dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang / nam mkha'i bar ma lus par
gang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par
'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
la la dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so/ /la la dag
gis ni| mu tig gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang /
shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / go shiR+Sha dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so/ /
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni/ lhab lhub dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/ /
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo / /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so/ /la la dag gis ni/ rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to/ /la la dag gis ni/ sil snyan dang / dkrol ba
sna tshogs dkrol to/ /la la dag gis ni/ glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to/ /la la dag gis ni/ sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab
bo| |la la dag gis ni/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni/ rin po che'i snod sna
tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna
tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang stong de thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni/ bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon
par sprul te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no/ /la la dag ni/ seng+ge'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te bcom
ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang
pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thags thogs med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha'i rnam par 'phrul
pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so/ /
pad+ma de drangs te g.yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams
cad kyang g.yos so/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so/ /de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams
dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyas nas phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to/ /rgyu med rkyen med par
ni| gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i
chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag go snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni/ snyigs ma lnga
can du gyur na/ 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo/ /de nas rang gi yul la gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod
bzhin du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs pa
mthong ngo / /thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang / kha dog
dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya
ba dang / da ltar bdag cag gi jo bo dang / g.yog tu bcas pa gang dor ba'ang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas
rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu rnam par dad
sems kyis/ /bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag khrol 'di nas myur du thong / /chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'gro
ba dang ni 'ong ba yang / /ngas ni su la'ang bzlog pa med/ /gal te lam ni rab shes na/ /gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos/ /bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rang
gi spyod yul gar dga' bar/ /gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te/ /bdag ni bcing pa lnga dag gis/ /bcings par mthong ngo gau ta ma/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga
ni rtog pa kun spangs te/ /grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa/ /ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas/ /sems can bcings pa thar par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi
spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
stsal to| |'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang / /the tshom thams cad rab spongs la/ /skad cig ci yang ma smra bar/ /khyod cag rnams ni da nyon cig /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig
rten dkon/ /chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon/ /dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang / /byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du/ /chos nyan pa yang shin
tu dkon/ /gang du bzod pa ston byed pa/ /de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'/ /gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi/ /rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba/ /stong pa nyid ni sgom pa dang / /sems
ni dul bar byed pa dkon/ /ji ltar ngas ni sngon spyad pa'i/ /byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'/ /de las me tog tsham tshod 'di/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /gang gis byang
chub 'byor byed pa/ /srid pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi/ /lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya/ /dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la/ /ston
pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig /chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol/ /rgya mtsho can gyi sred pa spongs/ /rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing / /sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas/ /
khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang / /de dag ma lus rnam par chom/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchog dang / /chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams/ /
sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi/ /byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams/ /dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems/ /bye phrag tu ni rab tu spongs/ /khams
gsum pa las grol ba yi/ /zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos/ /phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis/ /so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams/ /dngos po med la rtog byed
pa| |de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin/ /mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams/ /
'khor ba shin tu bsten par 'gyur/ /'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal/ /bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams/ /de dag phyin ci log bzhi las/ /de ring
rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams/ /chu bo bzhi las thar par byed/ /'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes pa/ /des pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro//
byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag /sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams/ /yang dag shes pas gcod par byed/ /phung po lnga rnams
yongs shes pas/ /zhags pa las grol zag pa med/ /yang dag yang du mi skye ste/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar byed/ /sdig pa dag
ni myur du shogs/ /sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la/ /'jigs pa med par pha rol song / /srid par yang dag yang skyes pas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas/ /
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni/ /'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rab spangs te/ /sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas/ /'khor ba'i
sdug bsngal dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig /btung ba'i dam pa 'thung bar byos/ /stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig /dam pa'i don la dngos po med/ /
rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med/ /'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste/ /byed pa po ni 'di la med/ /de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang / /dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med/ /tshor
ba drug dang sred pa drug /reg pa drug las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug /stong pa yin par shes par byos/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par/ /dngos
po nyid la brtag par byos/ /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos/ /gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste/ /dus gsum du yang dngos med par//
shes pa de dag nad med de/ /de ni bla na med pa'i lam/ /rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la/ /sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing / /tshu
rol pha rol rnam grol ba/ /de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang /
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i snyigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig
brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ shin tu zang
zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa rnyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /la la dag gis ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa
dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag
thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog
gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi/ /
'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la/ /rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas te/ /'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas/ /
rab tu gtams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su/ /chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol/ /rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+ma mngon
'dzegs te/ /mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis/ /chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob la/ /nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol/ /phyogs bcu
dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan/ /khyod kyi dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyi/ /thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par
mdzod| |chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / /ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas/ /sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la/ /bla med 'khor lo dam
pa bskor du gsol/ /chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /mi yi seng+ge de ring bsgral du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud/ /srid gsum mtsho las 'jig
rten bsgral du gsol/ /shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la/ /'gro ba gzud 'dod mtshungs med chos kyang ston/ /'jig rten nyes
pa'i dri ma bsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skad de las pad+ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ bdud sdig can/ ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar par 'gyur/ chu bo
bzhi las yang dag par brgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni/ sems
can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod dga' bar gyis shig /sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi
dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ci ste sdig med khyod la thab
